backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining admin credential login, access control mixins, and data models for clients, transporters, loads, tracking, and storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for admin-token and routing behavior fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing routing, auth, admin flow, UI components, and pages.
frontend/.gitignore: Ignore rules for dependencies, build outputs, environment files, IDE files, and Android/iOS build artifacts.
frontend/ADMIN_ACCESS.md: Documentation explaining password-based admin login, session token flow, and backend verification requirements.
frontend/ANDROID_BUILD.md: Guide for building Android APK/AAB files and preparing them for Play Store publishing.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration defining app metadata, web directory, Android HTTPS scheme, and keystore build options.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark UI colors and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entrypoint that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/android/_signing-env.ex: Template for Android signing environment variables used for release builds.
frontend/scripts/android/build-debug-apk: Shell script to build a debug Android APK, including prerequisite checks, web build, sync, and Gradle build steps.
frontend/scripts/android/build-release-a: Builds and signs an Android App Bundle for Play Store, verifying env vars, building the web app, syncing Capacitor, and running Gradle bundleRelease.
Builds and signs a release APK for distribution, checking signing vars, building the web app, syncing Capacitor, and running Gradle assembleRelease.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app with React Query, theme provider, router, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/LocationEv: Displays transporter-submitted location evidence with timestamps, location info, and screenshot viewing.
frontend/src/components/admin/Transporte: Lists transporters with their details, status, and recent or stale location information.
Provides filters for hiding transporters without location and selecting by truck type.
Shows a simple map-style grid of transporters with location data and selectable detail view.
Displays transporter locations with filters, map view fallback, and a list view, fetching transporters, truck types, and statuses.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSnippetPre: Renders an iframe preview of an ad snippet with diagnostics for empty or failed loads.
frontend/src/components/ads/BottomAd.tsx: Shows a dismissible bottom advertisement using stored settings and an iframe preview component.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access‑denied message with options to return home or go to admin login.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteE: Error boundary for admin routes that resets state and invalidates queries on retry.
UI for admin access errors offering retry, sign‑out, and guidance for resolving issues.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminSignIn: Prompts users to sign in with admin credentials and links to admin login.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth, loading states, and automatic retries.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for new users to enter name and email and submit a profile creation request.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Guards admin routes by checking auth state, handling redirects, loading, and error states.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders site footer with links, coverage info, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper with top navigation, main content area, ads, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar with route links, mobile menu, and login button.
frontend/src/components/loads/LoadIntere: Dialog to capture location and upload image evidence for load interest, with validation and progress.
frontend/src/components/loads/LoadLocati: Displays pickup and drop‑off locations with icons if provided.
frontend/src/components/transporter/Live: Card to start or stop live location sharing and show status, errors, and last update.
frontend/src/components/transporter/Tran: Card for viewing and updating transporter operational status with validation and timestamps.
frontend/src/config/adminBootstrap.ts: Reads and validates optional bootstrap admin principal from environment variables.
frontend/src/config/ads.ts: Defines AdMob config and HTML snippet plus utilities to load and save ad settings in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Provides mutations to grant or bootstrap admin access and invalidates related role queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminToken.ts: Tracks the admin token from sessionStorage and updates reactively via a custom event listener.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Combines identity, admin token, role, profile, and admin checks into a unified authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities and providing login/logout utilities via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for backend operations including admin checks, clients, transporters, loads, and messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransporterLiveLoc: Provides live location tracking for transporters, periodically sending geolocation updates with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and saves the caller’s user profile and role with React Query, gated by authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base typography/utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page describing the company, mission, values, and regional coverage using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements a multi-tab admin dashboard for managing loads, clients, transporters, messages, settings, and APK links.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPasswordLoginPag: Provides an admin login form that authenticates via backend and stores an admin token.
frontend/src/pages/ClientRegistrationPag: Handles client registration and profile updates with verification status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form that submits messages and shows company contact details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the landing page with hero, about, and promotional sections plus registration links and testimonials.
frontend/src/pages/LoadBoardPage.tsx: Implements the load board where clients post loads and transporters view approved loads, including form handling and file uploads.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a list of logistics services and an overview of the platform workflow.
frontend/src/pages/TransporterRegistrati: Handles transporter registration with form fields, document uploads, and verification status display.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's route structure and layout using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Provides a utility function to convert objects to CSV format and trigger a file download.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and emitting a token-change event when the admin token updates.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings, with typography, container‑queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, known issues, and feature requirements related to fixing admin token handling, routing, and dashboard access.
